page.title: 19RICHARD AT PLAY.
page.content: In the evenings I often play in the allotments.We play block which is a game where 1 person is counting and the others are hiding. We also play on the mudpile which has been left from the foundations of the new houses. On one side of the mudpile there is a limb of a tree which we use as a swing. We've made a base near the mudpile. It's by fir trees which we climb up and use as a look out. The main part of the base is the rain shelter. This is where someone has dumped some plastic and we've made a shelter from it. Each time we go to the mudpile we play a game of spying, army or S.A.S. They are types of war games but we use sticks for guns.
